venue.address_2: (Across from Century Hills Apartments) Rocky Hill
venue.name: The Rock Cafe

item.description:
Don't Miss The Biggest Party Event In 2007!

Please RSVP for this event on the Central CT Singles Meetup page Click Here

The Central CT Singles Group Has Invited Us:

Don't Put Your Costume Away Yet! It's The Last Halloween Party Of The Year!

Friday, November 2 @ 8pm at The Rock Cafe
944 Cromwell Ave (Route 3)
Rocky Hill, CT 06067
(Across from Century Hills Apartments)

The Party Starts At 8 pm

We will have prizes for the Best Costumes and Giveaways All Night

Free Pool Scary Movies Dancing

Drink specials Local Singles

Join Us For Prizes And Surprises At The Party Event Of The Year!

Tickets are $15 at the door


Click Here To Purchase Tickets

Please RSVP for this event on the Central CT Singles Meetup page Click Here

For More Info, Call Central CT Singles at (860) 236-3343

Or Call (860) 236-3343

Directions:

From I-91 South To Exit 23 (Dinosaur State Park Exit)

Right At End Of Exit

Left On Route 3

The Rock Cafe Is On Your Left At The Next Traffic Light


From I-91 North To Exit 23 (Dinosaur State Park Exit)

Left At End Of Exit

Left On Route 3

The Rock Cafe Is On Your Left At The Next Traffic Light


The Rock Cafe used to be "Oscars" and is 2 miles away from Rookies in Cromwell


See You At The Party - Stop in and say hello!

Rob T

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Central CT Singles Has Invited Us: Halloween Party Tonight -Friday Nov 2 at 8pm
